column1: The person who provided the useful definition: "Artificial intelligence is that activity devoted to making machines intelligent, and intelligence is that quality that enables an entity to function appropriately and with foresight in its environment."

column1: The computer system that was largely based on an efficient scheme for organizing, indexing, and retrieving large amounts of information and won the Jeopardy challenge in 2011
